name: WP SociLine – Put twitter on your blogs
author: TEKNIKFORCE

sections.description:
This plugin will help you to get all your tweets from your twitter timeline and display it in your site in the form of popup.

Demo and Tutorial

Here a few features listed:
* check whether profile name exists on twitter or not
* Can feth all tweets from your twitter timeline.

Important

We use our online service at http://customerapi.teknikforce.com/api/wppluginverifyordercode to maintain plugin activation licensing. The plugin is free to use, but you’ll need to activate it. The activation will be done automatically using this service.

Please review our privacy policy for information about how we handle your data.

https://teknikforce.com/privacy

In case you have any questions, you can reach out to support@teknikforce.com or create a support ticket at http://teknikforce.com/support

We do provide support to users of this free plugin.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the WP SociLine folder to your /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin using the Plugins menu in WordPress
  3. For the first time, you need to provide your name and email to get an activation code.
  4. The process is Complete
sections.faq:
can i get to know whter profile name exists on twitter or not

yes

short_description: With this plugin you can embed your twitter feed on your blog. Your visitors will see your latest tweets. They can like your tweets or even follow you …
